constituent: by means of, plow, drop, person
heisigStory: Picture a person dragging a plow behind, and the drop of sweat which falls from his brow as he does his work. Think of him (or her, for that matter) making a living "by means of the sweat of their brows."
koohiiStory1: A man earns his living by means of the plow. I imagine a sweating man dragging a bronze-age "ard" behind him as he plows his field himself, too poor to afford an ox.
koohiiStory2: Mr T now makes a living by means of a plow/hoe and the sweat he puts into it.
words:
以て(もって): with, by, by means of, because, in view of
以外(いがい): except for, other than
以後(いご): from now on, thereafter
以降(いこう): on and after, hereafter, thereafter
以前(いぜん): ago, since, before, previous
以来(いらい): since, henceforth
以下(いか): ~ or less than?not more than
以上(いじょう): more than, over
以内(いない): within
